column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Want some Chicago deep dish? This is the place. Some say it's the original
column2: or one of them. GOOD for sure. And they've got the wait system down to a tee: order your pizza so the kitchen can assemble it while you wait for your table. Their signature salad -- like their signature pizza -- is just plain ridiculous delicious. The pizza also has a buttery crust
